posts.body: So while we're here, why hasn't /pol/ moved to a p2p solution before?

>>f2332bd8-4797-46c5-9fef-f921216ea616
Good idea. Even with all the new users, it's damn slow to open threads, text only would help a lot. Audiovisual media could be link/embed only from dedicated hosting sites/seedboxes. Seedboxes because p2p has proven to not be perfect in a similar way to democracy, valuable data doesn't get seeded because it's rarely popular with the dumb masses, a few big seeders are needed.
